account_url.Description: URL of the newly generated account

address.Description: Address of the newly generated account

balance.Description: A place holder to keep account initial balance for referencing

passphrase.Description: Passphrase to lock/unlock the account. Default is empty

wallet_id.Description: ID of a wallet storing the newly created account. For keystore, it's the keystore resource id

data_dir.Description: Directory to intialize a genesis block

data_dir_abs.Description: Absolute path to the data dir

genesis.Description: Genesis file content in JSON format

instance_name.Description: The instance name of the node. This must be the same as the value in geth node config. Default is `geth`

extradata.Description: Computed value which can be used in genesis file

istanbul_addresses.Description: list of Istanbul address to construct extradata

vanity.Description: Vanity Hex Value to be included in the extradata

account.Description: Account being created under this keystore

account_url.Description: Local path to the JSON representation of newly generated account private key

address.Description: Address of the newly generated account

balance.Description: A place holder to keep account initial balance for referencing

passphrase.Description: Passphrase to lock/unlock the account. Default is empty

keystore_dir_abs.Description: Absolute path of the keystore directory

use_light_weight_kdf.Description: True to lower the memory and CPU requirements of the key store scrypt KDF at the expense of security

name.Description: Name of a new network. Directory name restriction applied

network_dir_abs.Description: Absolute path to a directory representing this new network

target_dir.Description: File system path to the directory on which new directory will be created. Default is current working directory

hex_node_id.Description: 64-byte hex value represents node ID which is seen being encoded in the username portion of enode URL. E.g.: `enode://[hex node id]@localhost:22000`

istanbul_address.Description: Address representing public key for the newly created node key. This is mainly used to construct the initial validators set encoded in `extradata` field of the genesis file

node_id.Description: 32-byte hex value represents the unique identifier for a node

node_key_hex.Description: Node key as hex. This can be used to populate `--nodekeyhex` CLI parameter

iterations.Description: Number of iterations to cycle through

variant.Description: Algorithm to use when hashing. Allowed values are `id` or `i`

key_data.Description: Key Data in JSON format to be used by Private Transaction Manager

password.Description: A password to protect the keypair

public_key_b64.Description: Public key in standard base64 encoding

istanbul.Description: Mix hash that is used to identify whether the block is from Istanbul consensus engine

hex_node_id.Description: 64-byte hex value represents node ID which is seen being encoded in the username portion of enode URL. E.g.: `enode:/[<hex node id]@localhost:22000`

istanbul_address.Description: Address representing public key for the newly created node key. This is mainly used to construct the initial validators set encoded in `extradata` field of the genesis file

node_id.Description: 32-byte hex value represents the unique identifier for a node

node_key_hex.Description: This hex value encodes the private key of a node
